thread.title: REFILE-Alberta taking IoIs for 10yr USD benchmark at MS+47 area

author: Reuters Editorial
title: REFILE-Alberta taking IoIs for 10yr USD benchmark at MS+47 area
text: March 7, 2018 / 1:20 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago REFILE-Alberta taking IoIs for 10yr USD benchmark at MS+47 area Reuters Staff By Julian Baker LONDON, March 7 (IFR) - * IPTs MS+47 area, benchmark size, tbp Thursday. Due 15 Mar 2028, pay 15 Mar, 5k/1k denoms. (March 7) Province of Alberta (ALTA), rated Aa1/A+ (neg/st), has mandated BAML, BMO, CIBC and TD for a 10yr SEC registered US dollar benchmark transaction. Target market: Professional & Eligible Counterparties (all distribution channels). The banks will be paid a fee by the issuer in respect of the placement of the securities. (March 7)
